tool_description: Scores and ranks photography locations based on multiple criteria including aesthetics, logistics, cost, and suitability for the specific portrait session type.

location_names.description: List of location names to evaluate

session_type.description: Type of portrait session for evaluation context

priority_factors.description: Factors to prioritize in evaluation: aesthetics, cost, accessibility, lighting, privacy, permits

budget_level.description: Budget constraint level: economy, standard, premium, luxury

group_size.description: Number of people in the portrait session

error_messages: Empty location list: Must provide at least one location to evaluate
Invalid session type: Must be a recognized portrait session type
Invalid priority factors: Must be from [aesthetics, cost, accessibility, lighting, privacy, permits]
Invalid budget level: Must be one of [economy, standard, premium, luxury]
Invalid group size: Must be a positive integer
usage: Provide location names from scouting results, session type, priority factors, and budget level. The tool returns scored and ranked locations with detailed evaluations.

ranked_locations.description: Location names ranked from best to worst fit

location_scores.description: Numerical scores for each location (0-100 scale)

evaluation_summary.description: Overview of evaluation methodology and key findings
